## PoiManager.getImageTexture() method

Return the \[\[ImageTexture\]\] registered under the specified name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getImageTexture(name: string): ImageTexture | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the \[\[ImageTexture\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ImageTexture](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagetexture.md) \| undefined
